member.name: IMFPMPClientApp.SetPMPHost
member.summary: Sets a pointer to the interface allowing a media source to create objects in the PMP process.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFPMPClientApp
member.summary: Provides a mechanism for a media source to implement content protection functionality in a Windows Store apps.
